text: Nastaneer was a Bengali drama film directed by Pashupati Chatterjee. This movie was released on 1951 in the banner of M. P. Productions Pvt. Ltd. The music direction was done by Rabin Chattopadhyay. This movie starring Uttam Kumar, Sunanda Banerjee, Dhiraj das, Karabi Gupta and Kamal Mitra in the lead roles. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Sunanda Banerjee * Uttam Kumar * Dhiraj das * Goutam Mukhopadhyay * Kamal Mitra * Karabi Gupta * Nibhanani Devi * Rajlakshmi Devi * Santosh Singha * Sikharani Bag ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Indian films Category:1951 drama films Category:1950s Bengali-language films Category:Indian drama films
title: Nastaneer (1951 film)
